name: Captain Glory DEMO
description:
Remake of my 2016 Newgrounds game Captain Glory: Tropical Invasion.

Link here: https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/668820

Captain Glory is an experimental game about resource management that takes the appearance of an arcade shooter.

You must make decisions about how to approach each enemy. It's not always smart to shoot them, and shooting carelessly is almost always a death sentence.

You play as the renown Captain Glory, protector of the MOTHERSHIP.

Infectious evil fruits have assembled themselves in vast hordes in an attempt to take down the last of humanity. You are the last line of defense against these delicious invaders

Tips

Don't spam shoot.

It's OK to run into enemies if you're high on HP but low on charge. This will probably kill them.
